20101208164511.000|20101208164513.500|CCO|DAVID SUSSKIND.
20101208164513.500|20101208164516.000|CCO|YOU SPENT FOUR YEARS RESEARCHING
20101208164516.000|20101208164518.500|CCO|THIS MAN, WHAT WAS IT ABOUT HIM 
20101208164518.500|20101208164521.000|CCO|THAT YOU FOUND SO COMPELLING.
20101208164521.000|20101208164523.000|CCO|>> DAVID SUSSKIND WAS A TALK 
20101208164523.000|20101208164525.000|CCO|SHOW HOST FOR 28 YEARS.
20101208164525.000|20101208164527.000|CCO|HE DID HIS SHOW IN NEW YORK AND 
20101208164527.000|20101208164529.000|CCO|WAS ON TV STATIONS AROUND THE 
20101208164529.000|20101208164531.000|CCO|COUNTRY.
20101208164531.000|20101208164533.000|CCO|BUT HIS REAL BUSINESS WAS THE 
20101208164533.000|20101208164535.000|CCO|MAKING OF MOVIE AND TV SHOWS, 
20101208164535.000|20101208164537.000|CCO|MOSTLY TV.
20101208164537.000|20101208164539.000|CCO|HE STARTED IN THE LIVE ERA OF 
20101208164539.000|20101208164541.000|CCO|TELEVISION AND HE WORLGED IT 
20101208164541.000|20101208164542.667|CCO|ALMOST UP TO HIS DEATH IN 1986.
20101208164542.667|20101208164544.333|CCO|HE DID CONTROVERSIAL SHOWS, HE 
20101208164544.333|20101208164546.000|CCO|DID HIGH TONE QUALITY TELEVISION

20101208164549.333|20101208164551.000|CCO|HUMAN CONDITION, STUFF THAT WAS 
20101208164551.000|20101208164552.667|CCO|REAL AND HE DID IT ALL HERE IN 
20101208164552.667|20101208164554.333|CCO|NEW YORK AT A TIME WHEN THE 
20101208164554.333|20101208164556.000|CCO|BUSINESS HAD MOVED TO THE WEST 
20101208164556.000|20101208164557.667|CCO|COAST.
20101208164557.667|20101208164559.333|CCO|>> AND AGAIN NO EXPERIENCE WHEN 
20101208164559.333|20101208164601.000|CCO|HE STARTED, HE JUST HAD A LOT OF
